tag.desc: HTML tag to render as container

label.desc: Property of option which holds the 'label'

sanitize.desc: Force use of textContent instead of innerHTML to render list items; Use it when the list items might be unsafe (from user input); Does NOT apply when using 'default' slot!

dense.desc: Dense mode for list items; occupies less space

dark.desc: List items will be colored with a dark color

bg-placeholder.desc: The list will show a background simulating scroll while rendering new list items. Requires a background color to be set on the virtual list or on its parent

scrollTarget.desc: CSS selector or DOM element to be used as scroll container instead of the root element of virtual list

default.desc: Customize how options are rendered; Suggestion: QItem

opt.desc: Option -- its value is taken from 'options' prop

itemProps.desc: Computed properties passed down to QItem

scrollTo.desc: Scroll the list to the item with the specified index (0 based)

key.desc: The index of the list item (0 based)
